NEW_CARD.TITLE: Let's create your new card!
NEW_CARD.DESCRIPTION:
This wizard will help you create a new card.
You will be able to customize it to your liking and review it before creating it

EXTRAS.TITLE: Extras
EXTRAS.DESCRIPTION: Add some extra information to your card.

REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Review your card before creating it.

CARDS.TITLE: {{collection.name}}'s available cards
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see all the cards available in the collection {{collection.name}}.

EDIT_CARD.TITLE: Edit card
EDIT_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit the information of your card.

PUBLISH_CARD.TITLE: Publish card
PUBLISH_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Here you can publish your card to make it available to other users.

BOX.TITLE: Publish "{{card.name}}" card
BOX.DESCRIPTION: Make "{{card.name}}" card public and available to all users of the platform.

VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.TITLE: Verification and safety
VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.BANK_ACCOUNT: Your account must have a bank account linked to it.
VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.30_DAYS: You must have been a member for at least 30 days.

BASIC_INFORMATION.TITLE: Basic information
BASIC_INFORMATION.NAME: Your card must have a name.
BASIC_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Your card must have a description.
BASIC_INFORMATION.RARITY: Your card must have a rarity.

CUSTOMIZATION.TITLE: Customization
CUSTOMIZATION.IMAGE: Your card must have an image.
CUSTOMIZATION.SOUND: Your card must have a sound.
CUSTOMIZATION.MESSAGE: Your card must have a message.

EXTRAS.TITLE: Extras
EXTRAS.DURATION: Your card must have a duration.
EXTRAS.RATELIMIT: Your card must have a ratelimit.

MODAL.TITLE: Are you sure you want to publish this card?
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: By publishing your card, you agree to the terms and conditions and privacy policy of the platform.
